lead_paragraph: Boston goalie Tuuka Rask has been hard to beat this season and was at his best against Buffalo again.

headline.print_headline: Rask Stops 35 Shots in Bruins' 2-1 Win Over Sabres
headline.main: Rask Stops 35 Shots in Bruins' 2-1 Win Over Sabres
